content:
It's not because,
I just figured out,
where I woke up...

content:
Why are there tourists out and about 
so early in the morning?
The night is when the real fun should begin!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Good morning, merry folks!
Oh, don't ask about my plans for today,
For a free-spirited clown like me, "improvisation" is what I do best!
info: 闲聊-一天起始（4-11）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Good morning, sunshine! <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>.
I heard tourists' voices in my dream earlier,
So my lovely dream came to an end. Still feeling drowsy...

content:
Last night, I made a black mask
to represent a "fierce warrior" character.
But I forgot to leave openings for the eyes and teeth,
